data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module is now two years available on CPAN (under this name) and
    used by a couple of people.

    There exists a sister module: Digest::Perl::MD4.

    Maybe I'd better used Digest::MD5_PP (like some of the modules in
    the Crypt::-hierarchie (e.g. Crypt::DES_PP)).

    Digest::MD5 uses Digest::Perl::MD5 as a fallback (if the bootstrap
    fails).
